summary: Add file backup/rollback capability for corrupted data recovery. Fixed timestamp collision issue by using microsecond precision in backup filenames.

changes.description: Added backup(), list_backups(), restore() methods with microsecond precision for unique backup filenames
Updated test_save_is_atomic_with_os_replace to expect multiple os.replace calls

risks: Backup filenames now include microseconds (20 digits vs 14 digits), which may affect any external tools that expect the old format
acceptance_criteria_met: TodoStorage.backup() creates timestamped backup file before save
Backups use same atomic write pattern as main save for safety
TodoStorage.save() calls backup() automatically before overwriting
TodoStorage.list_backups() returns chronologically ordered backup list
Only last N backups retained (configurable, default 5)
Old backups are automatically cleaned up
Fixed timestamp collision issue - multiple rapid saves now create unique backups
